channel.title: Ogre Pits AutoRanger Willing to pay!
channel.description:
I have looked thoroughout the site and have been unable to find an auto for the ogre pits (the King Lathas ones).
It would include:
Antiban AntiRandom Human like mouse movement! Antilogout NO SRL! I don't like it. I wouldn't want it to be too long between the ogres because my range is 82+. The standard autofighters I have used take too long in between ogres.
I would be willing to pat maybe 300k for this script. Post how much you'd be willing to script it for. I do not think it would be impossible to script, but I don't know much about scripting, so post here.
If you have any ideas on what I should have added post here too, please. Or, if you know of any scropts please post them too.
Thanks.

item.title: Ogre Pits AutoRanger Willing to pay!
item.dc:creator: @DaWunder DaWunder
item.description:
@DaWunder wrote:

Lol Maybe he needs a member acc to create one doh ? ;O
And also, its damn lot of work to do because you don’t want SRL, but still want randoms etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Ogre Pits AutoRanger Willing to pay!
item.dc:creator: @Onad9 Onad9
item.description:
@Onad9 wrote:

Okay, I added you, I will be online most of the day today so when u come online we can talk. ;D[br][size=1]Posted at: December 10, 2006, 09:33:36 AM[/size][hr]It also does not need to pick up the arrows, and Charmz is not making the script I guess because I told him he couldn’t go on my account , like wtf?
